ISSUE.TITLE: Admin.Common.Validation.NotEmpty
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) I downloaded the latest with source 2) Ran a fresh install on my localhost 3) Went to site settings, saved my site with out a 'logo' 4) Get the error: ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/37557794-741b-4178-916a-35b84568ae1e) But I do see it in the local settings: ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f77ece4c-477a-4a5d-af55-f8ad0d118e14)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7432 Swiper plugin required field validation is missing
